naming_conventions.classes: PascalCase with 'Service' suffix for service layer (e.g., TagService, PromptService)
naming_conventions.prompt_files: Title_With_Underscores.md; tags composed via hyphenated folder segments

architecture_pattern: Electron multi-process with service-oriented architecture: Main process orchestrator + Renderer views + Service layer (TagService, PromptService, PartialService, SearchService) + PromptManager facade

glossary.Prompt: Markdown-based content unit with tag, title, content, and parameters.
glossary.Partial: Reusable snippet referenced in prompts; stored separately and browsed/edited in the Partials UI.
glossary.Tag: Hierarchical categorization derived from nested folders (e.g., com-mail-formal).
glossary.SearchIndex: lunr-built index over title/tag/content for ranked queries.
glossary.Renderer: Electron process that renders a specific window's UI (search/editor/partials).
glossary.Main Process: Electron process managing windows, IPC, and persistence.
glossary.IPC: Inter-process communication between renderer and main via handlers (ipcMain.handle).
glossary.Electron Store: Key-value persistence (theme, prompts folder) across sessions.
glossary.Prompts Folder: User-chosen directory containing prompts/ and its hierarchy
glossary.PromptManager: Facade orchestrator coordinating service layer; maintains file watchers and exposes unified API.
glossary.TagService: Shared service for tag/path validation, depth checking, folder management; used by both Prompt and Partial services.
glossary.PromptService: Service layer handling prompt CRUD operations, file parsing, and metadata extraction.
glossary.PartialService: Service layer managing partial CRUD, dot-notation paths, and content resolution.
glossary.SearchService: Service layer managing lunr index, search queries, and tag filtering with wildcards.
